name: Starfall Apocalypse
description:
Made for PGMMV Summer Jam  with Pixel Game Maker MV engine!

Defend your home planet from an onslaught of falling stars. Can you hold them off for  5 minutes?

CONTROLS - KEYBOARD ONLY:

- Left / Right click to fire cannons

- Mouse movement for crosshair

- Space to start

- F5 to reset the game

- Esc to toggle fullscreen / windows

CREDITS:

Developer - Baz

Pixel Artist - Noobk

Music/SFX - PGMMV RTP
